titleStmt.title: The famous history of Auristella originally written by Don Gonsalo de Cepedes ; together with the pleasant story of Paul of Segovia, by Don Francisco de Quevedo ; translated from the Spanish.
Español Gerardo. Parte 1, discurso 2. English
titleStmt.author: Céspedes y Meneses, Gonzalo de, 1585?-1638.
Quevedo, Francisco de, 1580-1645. Historia de la vida del Buscón. English.
W. B.

notesStmt.note: "The famous history of Auristella" appears as part I, discurso 2, in "El Español Gerado." Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
